com.turbomanage.httpclient
Class ConsoleRequestLogger

java.lang.Object
  com.turbomanage.httpclient.ConsoleRequestLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
RequestLogger
public class ConsoleRequestLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequestLogger

Default RequestLogger used by BasicHttpClient. In recent versions of Android, log() gets directed to LogCat so this can work for Android, too. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2220547/why-doesnt-system -out-println-work-in-android

Author:
David M. Chandler
